meanings.definition: The beliefs or practices of Gnosticism.
meanings.sent1: Many scholars study ancient gnosticisms to understand their spiritual beliefs.
meanings.sent2: Her interest in gnosticisms led her to explore various mystical texts.
meanings.sent3: The book club found humor in the protagonist's obsession with gnosticisms.
meanings.sent4: In the story, the forbidden gnosticisms were like hidden treasures waiting to be discovered.
meanings.sent5: The gnosticisms of the secret society were shrouded in mystery and intrigue.

meanings.sent1: The gnosticisms of the ancient texts reflected a deep understanding of spirituality.
meanings.sent2: His gnosticisms were evident in the way he approached philosophical questions.
meanings.sent3: The comedian joked about the quirky gnosticisms of his eccentric character.
meanings.sent4: Her gnosticisms shone brightly in the midst of confusion and doubt.
meanings.sent5: The gnosticisms of the wise old sage were revered by all who sought knowledge.
